name: Hordenaum
description:
Submission to  Brackey's GameJam 2021.1.
- Izometric zombie shooter. 
- Coop mode available. 
- Many difficulty levels.

How many waves can you survive? How many donuts can you collect.

Remember that enemies are STRONGER TOGETHER !

Attribution:
models - https://kenney.nl/assets

keyboard icons - https://retryeli.itch.io/1bit-controller
